title: Topic 001 Question 065
body: You need to deploy an application, which is packaged in a container image, in a new project. The application exposes an HTTP endpoint and receives very few requests per day. You want to minimize costs. What should you do?
options: Deploy the container on Cloud Run.
Deploy the container on Cloud Run on GKE.
Deploy the container on App Engine Flexible.
Deploy the container on GKE with cluster autoscaling and horizontal pod autoscaling enabled.
